QuestData.Title: Situation at Sunsail Anchorage
QuestData.Description: Sunsail Anchorage has been overrun by Wretched scum. As soon as we manage to get reinforcements to the area we'll show those thugs who's boss, $n.$B$BIn the meantime you can help by showing them a bit of discipline. Go in there and show them we are not to be trifled with. You will find Sunsail Anchorage just to the west of Fairbreeze Village.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 5 Wretched Thugs and 5 Wretched Hooligans and report to Ranger Degolien in Eversong Woods.
QuestData.CompletionText: Did you teach those Wretched a lesson?
QuestData.RewardText: That'll teach them not to mess with us. Good work, $N.
